## Purpose

The `SNP-slice` algorithm enables reconstruction of SNP haplotypes from bi-allelic data, allowing for inference of haplotype/strain frequencies.

## Existing resources

The [`SNP-slice` GitHub repository](https://github.com/nianqiaoju/snp-slice) includes scripts for implementing the SNP-slice algorithm, as well as scripts for analyzing output and generating figures. 

## Citation

The publication associated with the `SNP-slice` algorithm and analysis scripts can be found [here (Ju et al 2024 Bioinformatics)](https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btae344).
